title: The Grail Quest Trilogy Omnibus by Bernard Cornwell

Book 1 - Harlequin: 1342. The English, led by Edward III, are laying waste to the French countryside. The archers, the common men, are EnglandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s secret weapon. The French know them as Harlequins. Thomas Hookton is one of these archers. But he is also on a personal mission: to avenge his fatherÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s death and retrieve a stolen relic. Thomas begins a quest that will lead him to finally where the two armies face each other at Crecy.

Book 2 - Vagabond: 1346. England lies exposed to the threat of invasion. Thomas of Hookton finds himself back in the north as the Scots invade on behalf of the French. He is determined to pursue his quest: to discover whether a relic he is searching for is the Holy Grail.

Book 3 - Heretic: The Hundred Years War has been suspended. The truce release Thomas of Hookton to pursue his arch enemy and resume his quest for the prized relic: the Holy Grail. But fate strikes and the plague grips hold. And the Holy Grail is needed more than ever as a sign of GodÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s favour.
